steps.title: Draw an oval.
steps.content: Draw an oval.

steps.title: Overlap it with a circle.
steps.content: Overlap it with a circle.

steps.title: Overlap both with another smaller oval.
steps.content: Overlap both with another smaller oval.

steps.title: Overlap the big circle with an oval on the left edge.
steps.content: Overlap the big circle with an oval on the left edge.

steps.title: At the bottom make a shape as given.
steps.content: At the bottom make a shape as given.

steps.title: Join the cluster of ovals and the shape below with two straight lines.
steps.content: Join the cluster of ovals and the shape below with two straight lines.

steps.title: Attach a couple of straight lines on either side for the arms.
steps.content: Attach a couple of straight lines on either side for the arms.

steps.title: Add two overlapping ovals for the feet.
steps.content: Add two overlapping ovals for the feet.

steps.title: Add further circles on the edge of the arm lines.
steps.content: Add further circles on the edge of the arm lines.

steps.title: Make four circular digits on the edge of the circles for both hands.
steps.content: Make four circular digits on the edge of the circles for both hands.

steps.title: Put short lines for the eyes and a small oval for the nose.
steps.content: Put short lines for the eyes and a small oval for the nose.

steps.title: Draw all the details.
steps.content: Draw all the details.

steps.title: Erase unwanted lines.
steps.content: Erase unwanted lines.

steps.title: Color the snoopy and apply soft shades to it.
steps.content: Color the snoopy and apply soft shades to it.

steps.title: Draw a horizontal oval.
steps.content: Draw a horizontal oval.

steps.title: Overlap it with a smaller oval on its upper edge.
steps.content: Overlap it with a smaller oval on its upper edge.

steps.title: Further overlap it with another oval on its right edge.
steps.content: Further overlap it with another oval on its right edge.

steps.title: Create a circle at the bottom at a distance.
steps.content: Create a circle at the bottom at a distance.

steps.title: Join the above with a circle at the bottom
steps.content: Join the above with a circle at the bottom

steps.title: Attach a couple of lines each on both sides for the arms.
steps.content: Attach a couple of lines each on both sides for the arms.

steps.title: Drop down three short straight lines for the legs.
steps.content: Drop down three short straight lines for the legs.

steps.title: Put small circles on either edge of the arms
steps.content: Put small circles on either edge of the arms

steps.title: Create flat ovals at the base of the legs for the paws.
steps.content: Create flat ovals at the base of the legs for the paws.

steps.title: Create flower-like circles around the hand-circles.
steps.content: Create flower-like circles around the hand-circles.

steps.title: Overdraw the guides with clean lines and add a tail.
steps.content: Overdraw the guides with clean lines and add a tail.

steps.title: Erase all guidelines.
steps.content: Erase all guidelines.

steps.title: Color your drawing and apply a bit of shade.
steps.content: Color your drawing and apply a bit of shade.
